channel.title: compiler on My Point of View
channel.description: Recent content in compiler on My Point of View

item.title: I Built a Ruby Compiler
item.description: Note: Please don’t share this on Hacker News – I don’t need the grief from gatekeepers telling me I don’t know how to write a compiler. This is an account for myself and for friends. /hugs I said in my previous post, I Built a Ruby Parser, that I would write about my ongoing compiler project Natalie, but I really wanted to finish the compiler rewrite first. I’m proud to say the rewrite is finished!
